parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapon Pool

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add magazines to the magazine pool, of which the player may choose in the following mission. Available in campaigns only.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''addMagazinePool''' [magazineName, count]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [magazineName, count]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]] - magazine name. See the topic [[:Category:Weapons]] for reference about possible values.

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - number of magazines to add

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[addMagazinePool]] ["M16", 20];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addMagazineGlobal]], [[addMagazine]], [[addMagazines]], [[addMagazineCargo]], [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[addWeaponPool]], [[clearMagazinePool]], [[queryMagazinePool]], [[addMagazineAmmoCargo]]
</value></part></template>
